summary: This release adds a beta messaging system so you can send notes between Plant, Meadow, and Clearing, and we've rolled out Grove Mode terminology across the entire app. Under the hood, we hardened security across auth and sessions, fixed a bunch of iOS Safari quirks by replacing form actions with JSON APIs, and added a security auditor skill called hawk-survey.
